Title: Relates to enacting the "food service packaging recycling funding act"
Summary: Enacts the "food service packaging recycling funding act" in order to provide sustainable funding to increase the state's infrastructure investment for the diversion of food service packaging materials from disposal, assist in establishing domestic end-use markets for recovered food service packaging materials and reduce litter and marine debris attributable to food service packaging materials.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 34 §§27-3401 - 27-3409, En Con L; add §92-kk, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "food service packaging recycling funding act"
